name: Quick Start (1on1)
description: Score a goal in the first 10 seconds of a 1on1 match

name: Quick Start (2on2)
description: Score a goal in the first 10 seconds of a 2on2 match

name: Speed Demon (1on1)
description: Score 3 goals within 60 seconds in a 1on1 match

name: Speed Demon (2on2)
description: Score 3 goals within 60 seconds in a 2on2 match

name: Blitzkrieg (1on1)
description: Win a 1on1 match in under 4 minutes

name: Blitzkrieg (2on2)
description: Win a 2on2 match in under 4 minutes

name: Hot Streak (1on1)
description: Win 5 matches in a row in 1on1 mode

name: Hot Streak (2on2)
description: Win 5 matches in a row in 2on2 mode

name: Never Give Up (1on1)
description: Win a 1on1 match after being down 0:5

name: Never Give Up (2on2)
description: Win a 2on2 match after being down 0:5

name: Giant Slayer (1on1)
description: Beat an opponent with 200+ higher MMR in 1on1 mode

name: Giant Slayer (2on2)
description: Beat opponents with 200+ higher average MMR in 2on2 mode

name: Time Flies
description: Play for a total of 8 hours

name: Dedicated Player
description: Play for a total of 16 hours

name: Full Day
description: Play for a total of 24 hours

name: The Carry
description: Score all goals for your team and win the 2on2 match

name: Silent Partner
description: Win a 2on2 match without scoring a single goal

name: Undefeated
description: Finish a season without losing a single match

name: Miracle Comeback
description: Win a match after being down 0:9

name: Oops...
description: Score 3 own goals in a single match

name: On the Podium (1on1)
description: Finish a 1on1 season in the top 3

name: On the Podium (2on2)
description: Finish a 2on2 season in the top 3

name: Dedicated Player
description: Play at least 1 hour in a single day

name: Weekly Warrior
description: Play at least 3 hours within a week

name: Team Player
description: Win with 5 different teammates in 2on2 matches

name: Unstoppable Day
description: Win 5 matches in a single day

name: Nail Biter
description: Win a match with the score 10-9

name: Marathon Session
description: Play 5 matches in a single day

name: Solo Grinder
description: Play 5 1on1 matches in a single day

name: Team Grinder
description: Play 5 2on2 matches in a single day

name: All-Rounder
description: Play at least 2 1on1 and 2 2on2 matches in a single day

name: On Fire (1on1)
description: Win 10 matches in a row in 1on1 mode

name: Unstoppable (1on1)
description: Win 15 matches in a row in 1on1 mode

name: On Fire (2on2)
description: Win 10 matches in a row in 2on2 mode

name: Unstoppable (2on2)
description: Win 15 matches in a row in 2on2 mode

name: Streak Breaker (1on1)
description: Defeat a player who has a win streak of at least 5 in 1on1

name: Streak Breaker (2on2)
description: Defeat a player who has a win streak of at least 5 in 2on2

name: Sharpshooter
description: Score 25 goals in a single day

name: Goal Machine
description: Score 42 goals in a single day

name: Unstoppable Scorer
description: Score 50 goals in a single day

name: Perfect Teamwork
description: Score exactly 5 goals in a 2on2 match where you win 10-X

name: Heavy Lifter
description: Score 9 goals in a 2on2 match and win 10-X

name: So Close... (1on1)
description: Score an own goal when you are at 9-X in a 1on1 match

name: So Close... (2on2)
description: Score an own goal when your team is at 9-X in a 2on2 match

name: Adding Insult to Injury (1on1)
description: Score an own goal when you are at 1-X in a 1on1 match

name: Adding Insult to Injury (2on2)
description: Score an own goal when your team is at 1-X in a 2on2 match

name: False Start (1on1)
description: Score an own goal when the score is 0-0 in a 1on1 match

name: False Start (2on2)
description: Score an own goal when the score is 0-0 in a 2on2 match

name: Wrong Direction Day
description: Score 5 own goals in a single day

name: After Meeting Rookie
description: Play 10 matches on Wednesdays between 15:00 and 18:00

name: After Meeting Regular
description: Play 25 matches on Wednesdays between 15:00 and 18:00

name: After Meeting Legend
description: Play 50 matches on Wednesdays between 15:00 and 18:00

name: Dedicated
description: Play for 100 hours across all seasons

name: Obsessed
description: Play for 250 hours across all seasons

name: No Life
description: Play for 500 hours across all seasons
